My ship is spinning by itself when I take SAS off. The control thingy in left bottom corner shows that yaw is moving.

[http://imgur.com/ADDldCO](http://imgur.com/ADDldCO)
You probably have some trim active. Modifier + X will clear all trim (Modifier is RShift on Linux IIRC)

It's probably a mod putting control inputs. You have FAR, its pilot assistance tools provide control inputs. Other mods might too.

Another possibility is you have a joystick or gamepad set up and it's not properly centred.

> 
> You probably have some trim active. Modifier + X will clear all trim (Modifier is RShift on Linux IIRC)

I checked that, there was no trim active. Also, even if trim was active it would show that in the control thing.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> It's probably a mod putting control inputs. You have FAR, its pilot assistance tools provide control inputs. Other mods might too.
> Another possibility is you have a joystick or gamepad set up and it's not properly centred.

My joystick was not even plugged in but that FAR thing might have something to do with this
